item.description:
Coed reverse doubles A/AA. 

 

Click here to sign up.


In the email above (unless I already know you) please provide the following information:

Name 
Gender 
Your doubles experience; give detail to convince me you are A-level or AA-level.

If you want to bring a guest, provide similar info for them. Preference is given to higher level players. Note that sending an email does not guarantee a spot to play; spots are only guaranteed if you receive a positive confirmation email. If my response to your message seems slow, then you haven't provided enough to convince me you're A-level.
item.how_to_find_us: Between 2nd and 3rd parking lots. To bike or walk there, once you cross over the Charles River, turn right and stay on the sidewalk between Soldiers Field Road and the Charles. Go all the way to Eliot Bridge and through its underpass.
item.name: Advanced Doubles At The River
